ygData.subject: RE: Human Shadowknight
ygData.msgSnippet: No one got a human shadowknight to commend? How abt shadowknight from other races to commend?  How to raise fraction? Thx! On Wednesday, 07 June, 2000 9:19 AM,
ygData.messageBody:
No one got a human shadowknight to commend? How abt shadowknight from other
races to commend? How to raise fraction? Thx!

On Wednesday, 07 June, 2000 9:19 AM, LKW [SMTP:leekw13@...]
wrote:
> Just wondering...HU SHD can enter FP town, but can they enter other good
race cities like Kelethin, Qeynos, Kalathin, Halas, Steamfont, Faydark and
Rivervale?
>
> If not, how can I raise fraction so tat I can enter these town.
>
> Given the fact tat I can enter FP, does tat mean commonlands npc vendors
won't KOS me on sight?
>
> Which is best for a HU SHD, I mean low, mid and high lvl:
> - 2HS
> - 2HB
> - 1HS + shield
> - 1HB + shield (sound unlikely to me)
> - Piercing + shield
>
> They can't use 2 x 1H weaps right?
>
> Oh, the HU SHD god is Innoruuk (coz tat's the only way to start at FP).
>
> Thx.
